attributes.action: Use Empty Taxpayer funded accomodatiom to house homeless families over Christmas
attributes.additional_details: According to Shelter 80,000 children will be homeless this Christmas, let's use taxpayer funded accommodation to provid temporary respite  care
attributes.background: With Parliament being closed for several weeks over Christmas, open up MP's uninhabited London accommodation to homeless families and encourage every MP to provide Christmas lunch for the new occupants

rejection.details: This would be a decision for individual MPs to take, not for Parliament as a whole.
